sakewin kiyathoth me aagam thunatama podu lakshanaya wanne eewaye dewa bhashithayan thamagema shreshtathwaya wara nangana, thama maha wishwa shakthiya bawath, thamata yatath wena lesath, ese yatath wuwanta mokshaya labena bawath, no ese nam sadakalika andhakarayakin aathmaya wela ganu athi bawath danwana dewa paniwida walin yuktha wimaya…dewa bhashithayata amatharawa yamak ee liyawili wala athoth ee kalinawa ee ee aagamata pahala wu ugathun wisin, anugamikayan dewa pamula dana gaswima pinisa karana lada deshana malaya…maha bharathaya rachana kala wyasath pandiwarayada, ramayanaya liyu walmiki muniwarayada, kristhiyaniye diwyamaya prathapaya uluppa dakwana “helidarawwa” rachana kala shantha jonda, enayinma lipi 13k diwyabhawaya wenuwen rachitha tarsas hi shantha pawulu aposthalika thumanda, islamaye allah gana kiyawena surah heli daraw kala yusuf ali nam pandiwarayada poduwe samaja gatha karana ladde “minisuni dewiyan athi wishalaya, apa ithama kudaya..apata dewiyanta yatath wimath, ohu sarana yamen labena mokshayath hara kala haki ho kala yuthu an kisiwak natha..dewiyan adahima hara wenath yamak karanawa nam ee siyalu de nishpalaya..”
wisheshayenma binku kiwwa wideshiya soyuriya blog ekak liyanawa man hithana widiyata.

eheth pasuwa wiwidhakara hethun matha apa wiwidha pathiwalata yomuwe.apa siyalloma wadagath yayi sammatha rakiyawak kirimata kamaththen pasuwemu.eheth apen samaharekuta akamaththen wuwada pahath yayi sammatha nithi wirodhi rakiyasadaha yomuweyi.owungen samahareku ese yomuwanne wenath ayage waradini, nathahoth jiwath wimata wena magak nomathi wima nisaya.namuth bohowita wiwechanaya wanne, daduwam labanne, apahasa labanne owun pamanaki, owunwa ema thathwayata pathkala aya yahathin wajabe
